import React from 'react' const BlogInfo = ({blog, handleLikes, handleRemoval, user}) => { const hideWhenNoAuthorization = { display: user.id.toString() === blog.user.id.toString() ? '' : 'none'} console.log(user) console.log(blog) console.log(hideWhenNoAuthorization) const blogStyle = { paddingTop: 10, paddingLeft: 2, border: 'solid', borderWidth: 1, marginBottom: 5 } return (

{blog.title}

{blog.author}

{blog.url}

{blog.likes}

)} export default BlogInfo
